title: Why did the mods decided to become mods
body: I don't see the point. Why bother 'helping' a community that you 'love' when its full of hate towards you. What is the point to becoming a mod if you are hated by all the normal players? I don't see the joy in that besides just being power-hungry. This might be coming out as a rant but its a legitimate question. I'm sure not all of you are terrible people but why do you decide to continue modding when you are always turned into the bad guy.
